Telegram use to be my primary messaging app, now it‚Äôs signal.

Signal: 40+
iMessage: less than 5
Other: 0
How do you know how many Signal contacts do you have?
from Android system address book
Easier to check how many Signal contacts you have from within the app, by pressing the new message pencil icon
Yes, there are the names but no counter ?!

Because Signal is my default messaging app, I would have to manually count to give exact numbers. Interestingly, my ‚ÄúInsights‚Äù information says that over the past 7 days, 99% of my messaging has been encrypted. I do all my messaging in Signal, so that sounds about right. Over a longer period of time, my usage would probably settle into 95% Signal and 5% SMS.

Now I see WhatsApp shows the number of contacts.
That would be a good feature to add to Signal
Might have to show Signal and SMS contacts counter separately.

Count of Signal contacts Feature Requests
My phones contacts app can show me the amount of phone contacts but signal isn‚Äôt available as contact source. It‚Äôs only possible to link them. Is there anywhere a number, maybe within a submenu i haven‚Äôt located jet, where i can check the amount?
From my regular, non-work contacts only 1 is SMS, the rest is Signal.

I managed to move a conversation from iMessage to Signal. It wasn‚Äôt easy, it took a while and multiple attempts before my contact finally caved in.

One down, few more to go!

posts.name: Jeremy
posts.cooked: I have a couple friends who want sms, but almost all use signal now
I regularly talk to at least 10 contacts daily on signal , WhatsApp I have completely deleted my account and stopped using due to signal being 100% better in terms of privacy
How did you approach it and what won that contact over?

I had been casually mentioning Signal without explicitly asking them to sign up or anything. One day, they wanted me to loop them in on something, so I took that opportunity to ask them to have that conversation on Signal. I figured that they would be less reluctant to try a new messaging app if they were getting something out of it (information from me). They promptly created an account and we‚Äôve been talking on Signal ever since. I suppose patience and opportunism worked out pretty well in this case.
